details: This is the first page that users will see. Here the user will enter a location in which they want to find parking
The search bar utilizes Google Maps API and will auto fill based on known locations/addresses
In addition to typing in a location, users will also be able to click on the compass to grab their current GPS location

This is the second page that users will see after searching for a location. Here a list of buildings that utlizes the Lots! system will be displayed alongside a map showing their exact location. The listed buildings are all within a 2 mile radius of the search location
After selecting a building, users will be taken to the final section. Here users will be able to select individual parking lots and see real time status of the parking lot
For the admin users of our system, this will be the page they land on. The user will be able to login or register for an admin account
The registration form that admin users will have to fill out if they want to start managing their lots
The main dashboard for admins. Shows the status of the lots belonging to their buildings and a list of reservations
Reservation form that admins can use to reserve specific spots for events happening at their establishments
Once reservations are made, they will be displayed on a list on the right side of the dashboard
Mobile view for the first step of the parker home page
Mobile view for the second step of the parker home page
Mobile view for the third step of the parker home page
